alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Haakon; Mellette; Northern Jackson; Northern Oglala Lakota; Pennington Co Plains; Southern Jackson; Southern Meade Co Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 23 at 2:09AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN HAAKON...SOUTHEASTERN MEADE...NORTHEASTERN OGLALA LAKOTA...NORTHWESTERN MELLETTE... JACKSON...NORTHERN BENNETT AND EASTERN PENNINGTON COUNTIES THROUGH 300 AM MDT/400 AM CDT/... At 209 AM MDT/309 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 5 miles southeast of Cedar Pass, or 21 miles southwest of Kadoka, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Philip, Kadoka, Wall, Wanblee, Long Valley, Norris, Midland, Interior, Wasta, Scenic, Quinn, Belvidere, Cactus Flat, Cedar Pass, Black Pipe, George Town, Corn Creek, Grindstone, Ottumwa, and Creighton. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 98 and 174. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bennett; Haakon; Mellette; Northern Jackson; Northern Oglala Lakota; Pennington Co Plains; Southern Jackson; Southern Meade Co Plains
